models.name: shopping_mall_categories
models.description: Hierarchical category taxonomy for the shoppingMall catalog. Categories support optional parent-child nesting for multi-level organization. Used by product listing, search, and navigation. Contains canonical business identity (slug) and temporal audit fields. Related entity references: {@link shopping_mall_product_categories}.

foreignFields.name: parent_id
foreignFields.description: Self-referential parent category reference. {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-friendly category name used in navigation and search.

plainFields.name: slug
plainFields.description: Unique URL-friendly identifier for the category (business key).

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional textual description for the category used in admin and SEO.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp (Asia/Seoul timezone interpretation).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete timestamp; null when active.

models.name: shopping_mall_product_categories
models.description: Junction table linking products to categories. Represents M:N relationship between shopping_mall_products and shopping_mall_categories. Enforces uniqueness per product/category pair to avoid duplicate assignments. Managed as subsidiary data from product/category administration flows.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_product_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged product's {@link shopping_mall_products.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_category_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged category's {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When the product was assigned to the category.

plainFields.name: created_by
plainFields.description: Actor who created the assignment (nullable; may reference admin or system user).

models.name: shopping_mall_audit_logs
models.description: Append-only audit and event log for platform-level critical actions (admin operations, moderation events, system escalations). Designed for immutable historical records, forensic queries, and admin reporting. Entries are append-only and include free-text details for later investigation.

plainFields.name: actor_id
plainFields.description: Identifier of the actor that caused the event (user/admin/system). May reference other user tables; nullable for system events.

plainFields.name: action
plainFields.description: Short action code or verb (e.g., 'product_publish', 'refund_approved').

plainFields.name: entity
plainFields.description: Target entity type (e.g., 'product','order','review').

plainFields.name: entity_id
plainFields.description: Identifier of the affected entity (if applicable).

plainFields.name: details
plainFields.description: Human-readable or structured details about the event (JSON-as-string or text).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Event timestamp (immutable).

models.name: shopping_mall_inventory_events
models.description: Append-only inventory event stream capturing SKU-level inventory changes (adjustments, reservations, commits, releases). Each event ties to a SKU and optionally to an order or actor. Used for inventory audit, reconciliation, and prevention of oversells.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_sku_id
foreignFields.description: Affected SKU reference. {@link shopping_mall_skus.id}.

plainFields.name: delta
plainFields.description: Signed quantity change (positive for inbound, negative for outbound).

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Reason for the inventory change (e.g., 'sale', 'adjustment', 'return', 'reservation_expiry').

plainFields.name: reference_order_id
plainFields.description: Optional order id associated with this event (if applicable). {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}.

plainFields.name: actor_id
plainFields.description: Actor who performed the change (seller/admin/system).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Event timestamp (append-only).

models.name: shopping_mall_guest
models.description: Temporary guest session record used to persist guest carts and wishlists across sessions. Stores a guest token and session metadata. Not an authenticated user; intended for ephemeral guest state management and merges into customer accounts on registration.

plainFields.name: guest_token
plainFields.description: Opaque guest token used to associate temporary cart/wishlist sessions with an unauthenticated visitor.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: Optional user-agent string captured at session creation for diagnostics.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete timestamp when guest session is expired or removed.

models.name: shopping_mall_customer
models.description: Registered customer account. Stores authentication credentials, profile metadata and flags required for buyer flows. Customers may have addresses and persistent carts; this is an independent business entity (primary).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Account last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at

models.name: shopping_mall_seller

plainFields.name: password_hash

models.name: shopping_mall_supportagent

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Login email for the support agent.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Password hash for support agent authentication.

plainFields.name: display_name
plainFields.description: Human-readable name for the agent.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Whether the support agent account is active.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Agent account creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Agent account last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at

models.name: shopping_mall_admin
models.description: Platform administrator accounts with elevated privileges for governance and platform configuration. Admins are primary actors and all admin actions should be recorded in the system audit logs.

models.name: shopping_mall_addresses
models.description: Address records for all roles (customers, sellers, guests, agents, admins). Stores raw address fields used for shipping, billing, and address snapshots on orders. IMPORTANT: Owner foreign keys are intentionally nullable and must NOT cascade on owner deletion; they should be set to NULL (or left as-is) to preserve historical snapshots. Application-level archival / soft-delete must be used to retire actor accounts without deleting address history.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged customer's {@link shopping_mall_customer.id}. Nullable to preserve address snapshots when customer is deleted.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged seller's {@link shopping_mall_seller.id}. Nullable to preserve address snapshots when seller is deleted.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_supportagent_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged support agent's {@link shopping_mall_supportagent.id}. Nullable to preserve audit trail when agent account is removed.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_admin_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged admin's {@link shopping_mall_admin.id}. Nullable to preserve audit trail when admin account is removed.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_guest_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged guest session {@link shopping_mall_guest.id}. Nullable to allow guest cleanup without removing historical address rows referenced in snapshots.

plainFields.name: recipient_name
plainFields.description: Name of the recipient for deliveries.

plainFields.name: line1
plainFields.description: Street address line 1.

plainFields.name: line2
plainFields.description: Optional street address line 2 (apartment, suite).

plainFields.name: city
plainFields.description: City or locality.

plainFields.name: postal_code

plainFields.name: country
plainFields.description: ISO country code or country name for display.

plainFields.name: phone

plainFields.name: updated_at

plainFields.name: deleted_at

models.name: shopping_mall_products
models.description: Product catalog entry owned by a seller. Contains product-level metadata used on product listing and detail pages. Related entities: {@\link shopping_mall_skus} for variant-level data and {@\link shopping_mall_product_categories} for category membership. Business constraints: seller-level code uniqueness enforced by (seller_id, code).

plainFields.name: description

plainFields.name: primary_image_uri

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp (nullable).

plainFields.name: updated_at

models.name: shopping_mall_inventory

plainFields.name: available_quantity

plainFields.name: location

plainFields.name: last_checked_at

plainFields.name: photos_json

models.name: shopping_mall_carts
models.description: Persistent shopping carts and guest carts. A cart may belong to either a registered customer ({@link shopping_mall_customer.id}) or a guest session ({@link shopping_mall_guest.id}). Used to persist items prior to checkout and to support merge behavior when guests log in. Soft-delete and timestamps maintained for auditing and lifecycle management. NOTE: removed single-column unique constraint on shopping_mall_customer_id to allow multiple saved carts per customer. If single active-cart semantics are required, implement a partial unique index on (shopping_mall_customer_id) WHERE status='active' at DB migration time.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged customer's {@link shopping_mall_customer.id}. Nullable to support guest carts.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_guest_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged guest session {@link shopping_mall_guest.id}. Nullable to support persistent customer carts.

plainFields.name: guest_token
plainFields.description: Optional guest token for client-side mapping of temporary guest carts.

plainFields.name: reservation_token
plainFields.description: Optional reservation identifier used during checkout to correlate reserved inventory or payment attempts. INDEX recommended for lookup performance.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Cart lifecycle status (for example: 'active', 'merged', 'abandoned'). Application controls valid values; consider using an enum for stronger validation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete timestamp for cart recovery and audit.

models.name: shopping_mall_cart_items
models.description: Line items within a shopping cart. Each item references a SKU ({@link shopping_mall_skus.id}) and records quantity and unit price snapshot. Items are managed via the parent cart and include optional reservation metadata to support the checkout reservation lifecycle. Added composite unique constraint on (shopping_mall_cart_id, shopping_mall_sku_id) to prevent duplicate lines and simplify upsert logic.

foreignFields.description: Parent cart reference. {@link shopping_mall_carts.id}

plainFields.name: unit_price

plainFields.name: reservation_id
plainFields.description: Optional reservation identifier linked to inventory reservation or payment attempt.

plainFields.name: reserved_until

plainFields.name: created_at

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete timestamp for item removal history.

models.name: shopping_mall_wishlists

Supports named lists and soft-delete for lifecycle management. Recommendation: default is_public to false at DB or application layer to avoid accidental public lists for guests.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_guest_id

plainFields.name: processed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when refund was processed/completed.

plainFields.name: processing_notes
plainFields.description: Internal processing notes for support/admins.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_shipments
models.description: Per-order shipment records. Represents a fulfillment shipment created for an order or subset of order lines. References the parent order, the seller fulfilling the shipment, optional recipient customer and optional shipping address snapshot. Stores carrier and tracking metadata, current shipment status, and temporal audit fields. Designed as a subsidiary entity managed through order/fulfillment workflows.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged order's {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}. Reference to the parent order header for this shipment.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_id
foreignFields.description: Owner seller's {@link shopping_mall_seller.id}. The seller responsible for fulfilling this shipment.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Recipient customer reference. {@link shopping_mall_customer.id}. Nullable for guest or external shipments.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_address_id
foreignFields.description: Shipping address snapshot reference. {@link shopping_mall_addresses.id}. Stored for traceability to the address used at shipment time.

plainFields.name: tracking_number
plainFields.description: Carrier-provided tracking number for this shipment.

plainFields.name: carrier_name
plainFields.description: Human-readable carrier name (e.g., 'AcmeExpress', 'LocalPost').

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current shipment status (created, ready_for_pickup, in_transit, out_for_delivery, delivered, exception, returned).

plainFields.name: shipped_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the shipment was marked as shipped by the seller (ISO 8601 KST).

plainFields.name: delivered_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when carrier reported delivery or system confirmed delivery.

plainFields.name: weight
plainFields.description: Optional shipment weight in platform-standard units. Nullable when unknown.

plainFields.name: package_count
plainFields.description: Number of packages in this shipment. Business expectation: at least 1.

plainFields.name: notes
plainFields.description: Operator-entered notes about the shipment; searchable via GIN index for operational queries.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last-updated timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete timestamp. Nullable when not deleted.

models.name: shopping_mall_shipment_events
models.description: Append-only, time-ordered shipment event timeline. Each row represents a single event reported by a carrier or created by system/support. Events are immutable snapshots used for tracking feeds and audit trails. References the parent shipment ({@link shopping_mall_shipments.id}) and optionally the support agent who created/triaged the event ({@link shopping_mall_supportagent.id}).

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_shipment_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged shipment's {@link shopping_mall_shipments.id}. Parent shipment reference for the timeline event.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_supportagent_id
foreignFields.description: Optional supportAgent who created or triaged this event. {@link shopping_mall_supportagent.id}. Nullable for carrier-originated webhooks.

plainFields.name: event_type
plainFields.description: Event classification (e.g., label_created, picked_up, in_transit, out_for_delivery, delivered, exception).

plainFields.name: event_code
plainFields.description: Carrier-specific event code where available.

plainFields.name: event_time
plainFields.description: Timestamp reported by carrier or system for the event (ISO 8601, KST for business reporting).

plainFields.name: location
plainFields.description: Optional location string reported with the event (city, facility).

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Human-readable event description. Indexed for search/triage.

plainFields.name: carrier_status
plainFields.description: Carrier-provided status text; kept for preservation of original semantics.

plainFields.name: raw_payload
plainFields.description: Raw webhook payload or serialized carrier event JSON for later replay and debugging.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Event record creation timestamp.
